participant_1.background:
I want to spend more time with my grandchildren.
I wear a dress that makes me feel beautiful and go for a walk in the park.
I like to play video games with my friends to take my mind off of things.
i have two nephews.
our class is planning a trip to japan.

participant_2.background:
I used to live in a small town in the Midwest.
i have trouble getting along with family.
I love nature documentaries because they make me feel like I'm exploring the wilderness without leaving my couch.
I have a collection of lullabies that I sing to my baby.
i enjoy playing computer games.

content.text: Hello, my name is Susan.
Hello Susan, my name is Sarah.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and watch nature documentaries.
I love playing video games too! What are you playing right now?
I'm playing a new game called Genshin Impact. It's a lot of fun!
I've never heard of it. What's it about?
It's a game where you explore a world full of different characters and creatures. It's really fun to play with friends.
It sounds really interesting! I might have to check it out.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
I used to live in a small town in the Midwest. Do you like living in a big city?
I do! I love the hustle and bustle of the city. It's always so much going on.
I can see why you like it. There's always something to do.
Exactly! And there's so many different people to meet.
I like meeting new people too. It's always interesting to learn about different cultures.
Me too! I love learning about new things.
I have two nephews. I love spending time with them.
Aww, that's sweet. I have a baby girl. I love singing lullabies to her.
That sounds so cute! I bet she loves it.
She does! She always falls asleep to my singing.
I'm glad to hear that.
Me too!
